page.title: 13BISHOP LOVETT MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: { Bishop Lovett}is a{middle school}for children aged{9 to 13 years.}There are 285 children with 15 teachers. Each year group has 3 classes. The{school {day}starts at 8:55am and finishes at 3:25pm with a 70 min. break for lunch. The{building complex}is a mixture of old and new. The main building was a large 18th century estate house called {St.Johns.}In addition to general classrooms there is a {science {laboratory, hall and library}with additional rooms for{home economics, {craft, music}and{computer studies. {French}is taught as a second language. The{grounds}include a fine collection of specimen trees. There are pitches for{football,rugby and hockey.}At the edge of the field is a newly created {nature trail}through gardens, wood and wild area.
